original_title: 羞恥 コロナ禍就職難で行われた会社への忠誠心が試される男女混合 内定者検診 2022
overview: In the 4th year of Reiwa, when it became difficult to find a job due to the Korona-ka, the power harassment and sexual harassment pressure interviews for female students, which had been openly held at some companies during the difficult times of employment after the burst of the bubble economy, have revived. Whether the greasy middle-aged personnel satisfy their desires or test their loyalty to the company ... The breasts of JDs who were stripped of their recruitment suits and underwear and were naked in front of the male students were rubbed. In rare cases, the cracks in the back of the pubic hair jungle are widened, and the depths of the uterus can be examined.
title: Shameful Fuck. Unofficial Mixed Gender Examination To Test Loyalty To The Company When It Is Hard To Find A Job Because of Coronavirus. 2022
